description: Globus is a platform for research data management. The Globus service, operated by the University of Chicago, enables secure, reliable file transfer, sharing and data automation. The service is integrated into data portals, science gateways, and other web applications that manage data distribution from instruments and provide access to reference datasets.
name: Globus
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
